text.value: Please only use letters to record the respondent's name
The respondent must have been born before today
Is there anyone in this house who get farm land?
How many laps of farm land do members of this household farm? (4 laps = 1 acre)
Where do you people get water from for drinking most times?
Where do you people go to toilet/poo poo?
People from other houses go to the same toilet?
What you use for cooking - that coal, gas stove, wood, other thing?
What do you use for light in your house?
What is the main materials of the floor of your house?
What is the main materials of the roof of your house?
What is the main materials of the outside walls of your house?
How many bedrooms in this house that people sleep in?
Anyone in your house here get:
You have any animals, chickens, or ducks in your house?
How many animals people in your house get?
Anyone in this house who get money in the bank?
You ever go to school before?
What is the highest grade you completed?
You have children who not pass-by 10 years?
How many children you have, who not pass-by 10 years?
How many of your children (not pass by 10 years) are in school?
Please check your answers. Must be fewer than the number of children < 10.
In this school year, how much your households pay for children school (in US$)? This includes: children school fees, books, uniforms, transport, living on campus, and other things you pay money for?
C. Household Food insecurity Access Scale
In the last 30 days, you sometime worry that your household will not have plenty food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one of your household wanted to eat certain food but could not eat it because you people don’t have money?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one of your household eats the same type of food every day just because you people don’t have money?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any of your household eats food that you people never wanted to eat because you people don’t have money to buy other types of food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one of your household eat small food while your wanted plenty because you people never had plenty food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one in your household eat food that was very small in a day because you people didn’t have plenty food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, was there any time where your household didn’t eat at all because you never had money to buy food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one of your household ever go to sleep at night hungry because you people never had food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
In the last 30 days, you or any one of your household ever go the whole day without eating anything because you never had food?
Hard to happen (one or two times)
D. WHO Quality of Life Questions
How much do you worry about your safety and security?
How comfortable is the place where you live
How much do you like the place you are living?
You have problems because you don't have money?
How much you worry about money?
Is it easy for you to get good treatment or care from the clinic or hospital?
How much do you enjoy your free time?
How healthy is your community in your own eyes?
Can you look up to your friends when you need them?
Do you feel that people you know accept you?
What level/degree you feel your community people accept you as a person?
How much do you feel separated from the people around you?How much do you feel separated from the people around you?
Your home where you live is good for you?
You have plenty money to solve your problems?
